subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|墓%碣|ぼ%けつ}}: a [[tombstone]], a [[headstone]]
* {{ja-r|墓%誌%銘|ぼ%し%めい}}: an extra [[inscription]] at the end of a [[tombstone]] inscription, such as a short [[poem]]
* {{ja-r|墓%表|ぼ%ひょう}}: the [[text]] on a [[tombstone]], giving the [[deceased]]'s name, dates of birth and death, and other details
* {{ja-r|墓%地|ぼ%ち}}: a [[cemetery]], a [[graveyard]]
* {{ja-r|支%石%墓|し%せき%ぼ}}: a [[dolmen]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology 1
Derived terms
Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|ぼ}}

From {{der|ja|ltc|墓|tr=muoᴴ|t=grave, tomb}}. Compare modern {{cog|nan|-}} readings ''bō͘'', ''bōng''.

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: Seldom used in isolation. More commonly encountered in compounds.

subSections.title: Derived terms
